restrictions.condition: {"statement":"TJG_YWZLXX.YWID IN (SELECT ID FROM TJG_YWXQXX CONNECT BY PRIOR ID=FID START WITH ID={0}) \r\nAND (TJG_YWZLXX.ZT={1} OR {1} IS NULL)\r\nAND (BT LIKE '%'||{2}||'%' OR {2} IS NULL)","args":[{"expression":"parameter.P_YWID","scale":0,"length":16,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.P_ZT","scale":0,"length":16,"type":1},{"expression":"parameter.P_BT","scale":0,"length":0,"type":0}],"type":0}

restriction.name: VJG_YWZLXX_MOD_R1
restriction.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CASE WHEN ZT IN (0,2) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM TJG_YWZLXX WHERE ID=?",[O_MASTER.ID])
restriction.prompt: 只有待审核/审核未通过的业务资料才能修改！

restriction.name: VJG_YWZLXX_DEL_R1
restriction.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CASE WHEN ZT IN (0,2,3) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM TJG_YWZLXX WHERE ID=?",[O_MASTER.ID])
restriction.prompt: 只有待审核/审核未通过/拒绝的业务资料才能删除！
